One-on-One Time: Obudde bw'okubeera n'omwana nga oli naye mwekanamweka
Can’t go to work? Schools closed? Worrie: Tokyasobola kugenda kukola? Amasomero gagadwawo? W'eralikiridde mu by'ensimbi? Kya bulijo okuwulira obwelarikirivu, nebirowoozo ebingi.
School shutdown is also a chance to make: Okugalwa kw'amasomero nakyo kya mukisa okweyongera okutondawo  enkolagana ennungi nabaana baffe abato awamu n'abavubuuka
One-on-One time is free and fun. It make: Okubeera n'omwana nga oli naye mwekanamweka kiwa emirembe era kyassanyu. Kino kiretera abaana okuwulira nga baagalwa era nga balina obukumi, ate era kibaleteera okumya nti bamugaso
It can be for just 20 minutes, or longer: kiyinza okutwala edakiika nga 20 oba okusukawo, ekyo kiri eri ffe. Kino kiyinza okuberaawo mu budde bwe'bumu buli lunaku, kisobozese abaana baffe na'bavubuka okwesuunga akasera nga kano.
Ideas with your baby/toddler: Ebirowoozo kubimu by'osobola okukola n'omwanaawo omuto
Copy their facial expression and sounds: Wetegereze engeri omwana gy'akozesa amaaso na'maloboozi agamuvaamu n'engeri omwana gy'akozesamu/gy'asengekamu by'azanyisa
Sing songs, make music with pots and spo: Yimba enyimba oba oyiye obuyimba ng'okozessa ebintu ng'ensuuwa oba ebijikko
Tell a story, read a book, or share pict: Nyumyayo olugeero, sooma ku katabo oba mugabane ku bifaananyi
Ideas with your teenager: Ebirowoozo kubimu byosobola okukola n'omwanawo omuvubuka
Talk about something they like: sports,: Yogeera kw'ekyo kyebagala okugeeza nga ebyemizaanyo, omuziki, Tv, baseleeebu oba emikwano.
Go for a walk – outdoors or around the h: Mutambuleeko wabweru oba awo kumpi n'awaka.
Exercise together to their favorite musi: Mukole dwiiro wamu nga mukozesa enyiimba ezisiinga Okubanyumira
Read a book or look at pictures: Soma yo akatabo oba mulabe wamu ebifaananyi.
Do a chore together – make cleaning and: Mukolerere wamu omulimu. Okulongoosa n'okufuumba bifuule akazanyo.
Choosing builds their self confidence. I: Ok'we salirawo kizimba okwekiririzamu mu mwana. Singa kyayagala okukola tekimuletera kutekawo banga wakatiwe n'abalala, gunno gwe mukisa omulungi ok'wogeera naye ku'nsoonga eno. (Laba ku'lupapula oludako)
